ygData.subject: Re: Flight Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard of no such spell !  Maybe they are referring to the gate spells that you aquire at level 20.  Another possibility would be the levitate spell at
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard of no such spell ! Maybe they are referring to the gate spells that you aquire at level 20. Another possibility would be the levitate spell at level 24 ?

Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Robin McCaig [SMTP:twister@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 10:48 AM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Flight Spell

From: "Robin McCaig" <twister@...>

I read on a Eq Info Site about the LvL 20 Flight Spell available to wizards.
Has anyone heard or seen this spell? If so give me details about it.
Thanks,
Twisterkahn
Tarew Marr
LLTS!
